children.text: Sprint Planning is timeboxed to a maximum of eight hours for a one-month Sprint. For shorter Sprints, the event is usually shorter.

This made me want to prove that a RACI and scrum just don't work so grabbed this RACI-loving college and we build out a RACI based on the scrum guild.
Turned out that a scrum RACI is illuminating.  And I now think can be a great tool to help people do Scrum.
